name: Dream Girlfriend: Doomer Girl
description:
STORY

Sup, /b/. There's this girl...

The other day, I decided to go to the store for some cigarettes, and I met this amazing girl, a solid 10/10. She's unlike anyone else... Beautiful, dresses in black, smokes... and her smile... I can't stop thinking about her.

As for me, I'm just a regular depressed guy, who spends most of his time watching anime and fapping. A guy like me doesn't stand a chance with her.

How do I approach her and make a move, anons? Share your advice and wisdom. You don't come across a girl like her every day, and something inside tells me she could change my gray life.

And what would you do if you meet your dream girl?

KEY FEATURES

  • Captivating story
  • Animated characters and backgrounds
  • Animated sex scene
  • Visual effects
  • Comfy music
  • Achievements
